Stand Tall: Begin by standing at the front of your mat with your feet together or hip-width apart. Distribute your weight evenly across both feet and ground down through all four corners of each foot.
Engage Your Muscles: Activate your leg muscles by lifting your kneecaps and engaging your quadriceps. Draw your thigh muscles upward to stabilize your legs and pelvis

Engage Your Muscles: Activate your leg muscles by lifting your kneecaps and engaging your quadriceps. Draw your thigh muscles upward to stabilize your legs and pelvis.
Align Your Spine: Lengthen your spine by gently lifting your chest and elongating the crown of your head towards the ceiling. Imagine a string pulling you up from the top of your head.
Relax Your Shoulders: Soften your shoulders and roll them back and down away from your ears. Broaden across your collarbones and open your chest.
